title: VMware security advisory (AV26-038)
description: Between January 12 and 18, 2026, VMware published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in multiple Tanzu products.
products: VMware Tanzu GemFire  versions prior to 10.1.6
VMware Tanzu GemFire  versions prior to 10.2.1
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
